text:
No country can overcome the #COVID19 crisis in isolation. #COVAX, the global #vaccine initiative, is our best way to do just that- @antonioguterres.
🚨#ONLYTogether can we revive our #economies.
🚨#OnlyTogether can we end the pandemic & #Recover.
#VaccineForAll #VaccineRolloutSA https://t.co/DIAoXIV6HI
